name: Nutcrackers
description:
Hanz Silberhaus and his Nutcrackers have moved into the northern lands of the Realm of Winterholme. Why are they here? What is their goal? Can they be trusted?

A submission for the Winter Has Come Mausritter Game Jam

Nutcrackers is an independent production by ManaRampMatt and is not affiliated with Losing Games. It produced under the Mausritter Third-Party license.  Mausritter is copyright Losing Games.
